message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to invest in this valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you is $800000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900000. This is a compromise that I think is still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer. I'll go up to $850000, but I think $800000 is still the sweet spot for me.

I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $850000, but I still think I can get a bit more. I'll counter with $875000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
